data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Córdoba, Colombia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Córdoba, Colombia
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Córdoba, Colombia.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.section_summary: On average, 102 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Córdoba, Colombia.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Córdoba, Colombia and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Please, teach the 196,267 believers in Córdoba, Colombia how to pray to you and how to listen for your voice. That they might follow you into the good works you have prepared for them.
data.verse: My sheep listen to my voice; I know them, and they follow me.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Siripu people might believe through him.
Jesus, please help the 196,267 believers in the state of Córdoba to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Córdoba, Colombia.

data.section_summary:
the state of Córdoba, Colombia has a population of 1,828,900.

We estimate Córdoba has 196,267 people who might know Jesus, 1,515,085 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 117,549 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 9 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Córdoba.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
